characters.name: guard1
characters.quote:
The food today taste great. You should go to the Kitchen and have some...
If you have the PASSWORD, of course.

characters.name: cook
characters.quote: Now where did I put that nightshade? We need that to POISON... err, Hey, there!...

characters.name: servant
characters.quote: Take the KNIFE. You never know when you might need it.

characters.name: guard1
characters.quote: Only Knights and Royalty are allowed through here.

characters.name: guard2
characters.quote: This shift feels like it's never going to end.

characters.name: king's hand
characters.quote: This is the 'key' to the Wizard's Foyer

characters.name: monster
characters.quote:
The monster dazedly lifts it's head up, blinks it's eyes open,
 sniffs a bit... and goes back to sleep. Those robes must've fooled it.

characters.name: evil wizard
characters.quote:
What do you want, weakling? Get out!!
 *Laughs Maniacally* HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!

characters.name: queen
characters.quote:
Greetings Assassin, you've been summoned for a special mission.
The Southern Kingdom has laid siege upon the continent.
We must take action, before our own walls are toppled.
Intel infers that influence by an Evil Wizard is over the Kingdom .
Infiltrate the Southern Kingdom and ASSASSINATE this Evil Wizard.
Spare as many lives as you can, since the inhabitants are not acting of their own volition.
This teleportation scroll will transport you to the Southern Kingdom.
